author: Al Jazeera
title: Zimbabwe: Mnangagwa declares national disaster over coronavirus
description: Zimbabwe has yet to confirm any coronavirus infections but the president has declared a national disaster.
content:
In Zimbabwe, all public gatherings of more than 100 people have been banned as a precaution against the coronavirus.
Next months independence day celebrations have also been cancelled.
Al Jazeera's Haru Mutasa reports from Harare, Zimbabwe.

author: Al Jazeera
title: Zimbabwe launches 21-day nationwide lockdown0
description: So far the country has recorded seven coronavirus cases and one death.
content:
Zimbabwe began a 21-day nationwide lockdown on Monday.
So far the country has recorded seven cases and one death.
Al Jazeera's Haru Mutasa has more from Harare on the reaction to the shutdown.
